page.title: 07POCKET MONEY - A GIRL
page.content: THE AVERAGE AMOUNT OF POCKET MONEY A WEEK FOR A 13 YEAR OLD GIRL IS ABOUT Â£2 OR Â£3. HOW DO WE EARN IT? I GET MY POCKET MONEY BY DOING THE HOUSE WORK ON SATURDAYS AND SUNDAYS.THIS INCLUDES THE HOOVERING,POLISHING,DUSTING,A BIT OF GARDENING AND SOME COOKING.OF COURSE, I ALSO MAKE MY OWN BED AND KEEP MY BEDROOM CLEAN AND TIDY.I THINK OTHER CHILDREN DO THE SAME SORTS OF THINGS IN THEIR HOMES.WHAT DO I SPEND IT ON? I SPEND HALF OF MY MONEY AND TRY TO SAVE THE REST FOR SOMETHING IMORTANT OR EXPENSIVE.I BUY SWEETS AND GENERAL THINGS THAT I NEED DURING THE WEEK AND SAVE UP FOR SOMETHING LIKE A SPECIAL DRESS OR A PERSONAL STEREO UNIT.THE GENERAL IDEA OF POCKET MONEY IS,I THINK, TO LEARN HOW TO HANDLE MONEY AND TO LEARN HOW TO USE IT PROPERLY.
